regen.absent_element: saving chat history for future reference
regen.new_specification: The system shall save the chat history for future reference, allowing users to access previous conversations.
The application shall provide a set of emoticons that can be inserted into outgoing messages to enhance the messaging experience.

regen.absent_element: enabling selection of emoticons for enriching messages
regen.new_specification: The application shall provide a feature to select and include emoticons in outgoing messages.

label: Display a list of emoticons to choose from when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message.
absence: support of selecting emoticons when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message
